00022 #if !defined(AFX_CHARTOBJECT_H__6ED024F2_00D9_45D5_AB83_258EF0075288__INCLUDED_)
00023 #define AFX_CHARTOBJECT_H__6ED024F2_00D9_45D5_AB83_258EF0075288__INCLUDED_
00024 
00025 #if _MSC_VER > 1000
00026 #pragma once
00027 #endif // _MSC_VER > 1000
00028 
00029 #include <afx.h>                        
00030 #include <afxwin.h>
00031 
00032 class CChartCtrl;
00033 
00034 class CChartObject  
00035 {
00036         friend CChartCtrl;
00037 
00038 public:
00039         CChartObject(CChartCtrl* pOwner);
00040         virtual ~CChartObject();
00041 
00042         void SetVisible(bool bVisible);
00043         bool IsVisible()  const         { return m_bIsVisible; }
00044 
00045         COLORREF GetColor() const                          { return m_ObjectColor; }
00046         void SetColor(COLORREF NewColor);
00047         COLORREF GetShadowColor() const            { return m_ShadowColor; }
00048         void SetShadowColor(COLORREF NewColor);
00049 
00050         void EnableShadow(bool bEnable);
00051         void SetShadowDepth(int Depth);
00052 
00053         bool Clip(int& dX, int& dY)  const
00054         {
00055                 bool bResult = true;
00056 
00057                 if (dX>m_ObjectRect.right) 
00058                 {
00059                         dX = m_ObjectRect.right;
00060                         bResult = false;
00061                 }
00062                 if (dX<m_ObjectRect.left)
00063                 {
00064                         dX = m_ObjectRect.left;
00065                         bResult = false;
00066                 }
00067                 if (dY>m_ObjectRect.bottom)
00068                 {
00069                         dY = m_ObjectRect.bottom;
00070                         bResult = false;
00071                 }
00072                 if (dY<m_ObjectRect.top)
00073                 {
00074                         dY = m_ObjectRect.top;
00075                         bResult = false;
00076                 }
00077 
00078                 return bResult;
00079         }
00080 
00081 
00082 
00083 protected:
00084     void SetRect(CRect NewTect)  { m_ObjectRect = NewTect; }
00085     
00086         CRect           m_ObjectRect;           // Size of the object
00087         COLORREF        m_ObjectColor;          // Color of the objet
00088 
00089         CChartCtrl*     m_pParent;                      // Owner of the object
00090         bool        m_bIsVisible;
00091         bool            m_bShadow;                      // Specifies if the object generate a shadow.
00092                                                                         // This is not supported for all objects.
00093         COLORREF        m_ShadowColor;
00094         int                     m_iShadowDepth;
00095 
00096 private:
00097         virtual void Draw(CDC* pDC) = 0;
00098 };
00099 
00100 #endif // !defined(AFX_CHARTOBJECT_H__6ED024F2_00D9_45D5_AB83_258EF0075288__INCLUDED_)
